QuestData.Title: Weapons of Spirit
QuestData.Description: Imbuing the muisek into the weapons is a difficult process. Now that I have all of the required materials and the muisek of the creatures that you captured, I may begin. Please wait; I will return in a moment.
QuestData.LogDescription: Witch Doctor Uzer'i wants you to wait for a moment while he prepares the weapons.
QuestData.RewardText: As promised, you have your choice, $n. The muisek of the creatures has been forever sealed into the power of these weapons.$B$BYou may now wield their energy as your own. Use it well.
